July 23, 2020 Smooth NCR Mobile Pay Implementations During the implementation process for NCR Mobile Pay, there are important steps that require POS configuration. We’ve created the NCR Mobile Pay Implementation Guide <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bqe6gx23b/g/r2/ek/va/NCR%20Mobile%20Pay%20Training%20Update%20for%207-23-20.pdf]]> to help support your team in getting up to speed and ensure the installs go smoothly and quickly. Review this information with your team, along with the other Mobile Pay supporting documents, videos, and training materials provided.
Additionally, make sure your team is leveraging these excellent NCR Mobile Pay customer-facing materials <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bqe6gx23b/g/r2/ek/va/NCR%20Mobile%20Pay%20Training%20Update%20for%207-23-20.pdf]]> – marketing tool kit, FAQs, videos and more – that explain the benefits of our contactless solution.
NCR Silver Technical Certification Workshop
One of the best ways to learn about the NCR Silver Pro Restaurant solution is to participate in the NCR Silver Technical Certification workshop on August 3 – 5, 2020. This workshop is a critical step on your way to achieving a technical certification. We are offering the workshop virtually to make participating even easier.
The registration deadline is Thursday, July 30, 2020. Click here <[[https://www2.ncrsilver.com/technical-workshop]]> to learn more and register. You will be required to complete a pre-requisite course on NCRU (CURR699) before attending the session. If you have any questions, contact your Silver Channel Account Manager.
